seo.title: Services | SustainSage
seo.description: Explore SustainSage coaching packages built for relocation, returning to work, settling in the UK and light-touch check-ins.

hero.title: Coaching offers shaped by lived UK transitions
hero.subtitle: Pick the option that matches your context, then we tailor the details together.

overview.title: What stays consistent
overview.description: Each package begins with a 20-minute intro call to confirm scope, consent and boundaries.
bullets: ICF-aligned coaching with clear agreements and confidentiality.
Sessions held online unless we agree otherwise.
You lead the agenda; we bring questions, structure and reflection.

packages.title: Our four core offers
packages.description: Choose the focus that feels closest to what you need right now.

cards.title: Transition package
cards.summary: Six sessions to move through relocation or role change without burning out.
bullets: Clarify what a good move looks like for you.
Map constraints across money, visas, family and wellbeing.
Design grounded experiments instead of one big leap.
cards.imageAlt: Boxes and a map ready for a thoughtful move

cards.title: Returning to work
cards.summary: Support after a break to rebuild story, confidence and realistic rhythms.
bullets: Reframe your break without hiding it.
Prepare for conversations with employers and family.
Notice capacity, boundaries and pacing in real life.
cards.imageAlt: Home and work desk in balance

cards.title: New to the UK
cards.summary: Context-aware coaching to decode norms and choose your stance.
bullets: Name what feels unfamiliar or heavy right now.
Decide where to adapt, push back or opt out.
Plan job search or work strategies that protect dignity.
cards.imageAlt: Signpost with an abstract UK skyline

cards.title: Steady check-ins
cards.summary: One or three sessions when you just need an ethical sounding board.
bullets: Leave with 1–3 next steps to keep momentum.
cards.imageAlt: Notebook and tea cup ready for reflection

process.title: How we begin
process.description: A light structure keeps you informed while leaving space to adapt.
bullets: Intro call: confirm needs, scope and whether coaching is right now.
Co-created agreement: cadence, language, between-session support.
Regular reviews so we can adjust pace or close when goals are met.

faq.title: More about working together
faq.intro: A few practical answers are below—there are more in our full FAQ.

cta.title: Need help choosing?
cta.body: Share a few lines about what’s happening. We’ll suggest a starting point or signpost other support.
cta.primaryAria: Book a 20-minute intro call with SustainSage
